org.texgen.signals
Class RadialSignal

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.textures.AbstractChannelSignal
      org.texgen.signals.RadialSignal
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelSignal
public class RadialSignal
extends AbstractChannelSignal

RadialSignal radiates the signal from 0 to 1 from the center of the texture to the value defined by radius. The middle edges won't go to 1 with the default radius, they go to 1 at the corners.

Author:
Andy Gibson
